.. _`design_system_components_tablecatalog`:

TableCatalog
============

.. figure:: images/component_table-catalog.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

Table Catalog component which contains a :ref:`design_system_components_textinput` field and a :ref:`design_system_components_button` to open a catalog, which lets the user search and select data from a table.
The component can offer typeahead mechanisms for the input field or be set to read-only.


API Documentation
-----------------

:ref:`cs-web-components-base-formcontrols.TableCatalog.TableCatalog`


Related Components
------------------

:ref:`design_system_components_form`

:ref:`design_system_components_textinput`

:ref:`design_system_components_button`

.. :ref:`design_system_components_table`
